item.title: HUI Analysis
item.description: Contents 1 Initial Analysis 2 Secondary Analysis - 2.1 Function 1 - 2.2 Function 2 - 2.3 Encryption - 2.4 cef_api_hash - 2.5 Registry function 3 Dynamic Analysis - 3.1 IDA Debugger 4 CAPA Analysis 5 Conclusion HUI Sample Analysis Today, we will analyze a sample of HUI Loader and write a malware report on it SHA256 - 3ad1a9770a533c2bb8be9d4e7150a2a167d0709c4b0339a5fd6a511008cea7ef Tools Used Static Analysis: IDA,DIE,capa Dynamic Analysis: - IDA Debugger, Regedit
